name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Power-Up Kit
name_original: Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Power-Up Kit
description:
Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Power-Up Kit is a strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It came out on 11-12-2014. Koei Tecmo Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Power-Up Kit on PC, PlayStation 3, PS Vita and PlayStation 4.
